name: WP Coupon System
author: Noor-E-Alam

sections.description:
Clean and Super user friendly wordpress coupon plugin for coupon selling websites. It allows you to store shopping coupons, promo codes, vouchers or discounts and more from different brands and companies.

See live demo here: http://demo.wpvalueclub.com/wp-coupon-system/

Features

  • Super easy Installation.
  • Very Lightweight
  • Unlimited Color
  • Shortcode Settings
  • User friendly shortcode
  • Custom post enabled.
  • Category Support.
  • Custom ordering.
  • Shortcode Powered.
  • Unlimited coupon items.
  • All Major browser supported.

Pro Version Features

  • 2 Styles (Horizontal & Vertical).
  • 500+ Google fonts.
  • 100% customizable via shortcode
  • 5 button styles.
  • 24/7 Support.
sections.installation:
Installing this plugin as regular wordpress plugin.

After install, this plugin will enable a custom post called Coupons. Add category & coupon items on that custom post.
After adding items, you are ready to use this plugin in your post, page, widget or anywhere you like.

Go to page > Add New. On the editor, you will see a button called Coupon Shortcode by clicking button you see the shortcode settings popup, enter category name on first field, not category id or slug. Make sure spelling is ok. It is case sensitive.

Here is the default shortcode [coupon category="coupun-category" border_color="#dddddd" title_color="#0099FF" title_font_size="21" desc_text_color="#868686" other_text_color="#a1c44e" btn_style="blue"]
